class.name: TranslationServer
class.brief_description: The server responsible for language translations.
class.description: The translation server is the API backend that manages all language translations. Translations are stored in [TranslationDomain]s, which can be accessed by name. The most commonly used translation domain is the main translation domain. It always exists and can be accessed using an empty [StringName]. The translation server provides wrapper methods for accessing the main translation domain directly, without having to fetch the translation domain first. Custom translation domains are mainly for advanced usages like editor plugins. Names starting with [code]godot.[/code] are reserved for engine internals.

method.name: add_translation
method.description: Adds a translation to the main translation domain.

method.name: clear
method.description: Removes all translations from the main translation domain.

method.name: compare_locales
method.description: Compares two locales and returns a similarity score between [code]0[/code] (no match) and [code]10[/code] (full match).

method.name: find_translations
method.description: Returns the [Translation] instances in the main translation domain that match [param locale] (see [method compare_locales]). If [param exact] is [code]true[/code], only instances whose locale exactly equals [param locale] will be returned.

method.name: format_number
method.description: Converts a number from Western Arabic (0..9) to the numeral system used in the given [param locale].

method.name: get_all_countries
method.description: Returns an array of known country codes.

method.name: get_all_languages
method.description: Returns array of known language codes.

method.name: get_all_scripts
method.description: Returns an array of known script codes.

method.name: get_country_name
method.description: Returns the English name for the given country code. Returns [param code] as-is if it is unrecognized. [b]Note:[/b] The returned names are intended for editor scripts, plugins, or debugging purposes. The list of recognized codes may vary across different versions or builds.

method.name: get_language_name
method.description: Returns the English name for the given language code. Returns [param code] as-is if it is unrecognized. [b]Note:[/b] The returned names are intended for editor scripts, plugins, or debugging purposes. The list of recognized codes may vary across different versions or builds.

method.name: get_loaded_locales
method.description: Returns an array of all loaded locales of the project.

method.name: get_locale
method.description: Returns the current locale of the project. See also [method OS.get_locale] and [method OS.get_locale_language] to query the locale of the user system.

method.name: get_locale_name
method.description: Returns a locale's language and its variant in English (e.g. [code]"en_US"[/code] would return [code]"English (United States)"[/code]). [b]Note:[/b] The returned names are intended for editor scripts, plugins, or debugging purposes. The list of recognized codes may vary across different versions or builds.

method.name: get_or_add_domain
method.description: Returns the translation domain with the specified name. An empty translation domain will be created and added if it does not exist.

method.name: get_percent_sign
method.description: Returns the percent sign used in the given [param locale].

method.name: get_plural_rules
method.description: Returns the default plural rules for the [param locale].

method.name: get_script_name
method.description: Returns the English name for the given script code. Returns [param code] as-is if it is unrecognized. [b]Note:[/b] The returned names are intended for editor scripts, plugins, or debugging purposes. The list of recognized codes may vary across different versions or builds.

method.name: get_tool_locale
method.description: Returns the current locale of the editor. [b]Note:[/b] When called from an exported project returns the same value as [method get_locale].

method.name: get_translation_object
method.description: Returns the [Translation] instance that best matches [param locale] in the main translation domain. Returns [code]null[/code] if there are no matches.

method.name: get_translations
method.description: Returns all available [Translation] instances in the main translation domain as added by [method add_translation].

method.name: has_domain
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a translation domain with the specified name exists.

method.name: has_translation
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the main translation domain contains the given [param translation].

method.name: has_translation_for_locale
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if there are any [Translation] instances in the main translation domain that match [param locale] (see [method compare_locales]). If [param exact] is [code]true[/code], only instances whose locale exactly equals [param locale] are considered.

method.name: parse_number
method.description: Converts [param number] from the numeral system used in the given [param locale] to Western Arabic (0..9).

method.name: pseudolocalize
method.description: Returns the pseudolocalized string based on the [param message] passed in. [b]Note:[/b] This method always uses the main translation domain.

method.name: reload_pseudolocalization
method.description: Reparses the pseudolocalization options and reloads the translation for the main translation domain.

method.name: remove_domain
method.description: Removes the translation domain with the specified name. [b]Note:[/b] Trying to remove the main translation domain is an error.

method.name: remove_translation
method.description: Removes the given translation from the main translation domain.

method.name: set_locale
method.description: Sets the locale of the project. The [param locale] string will be standardized to match known locales (e.g. [code]en-US[/code] would be matched to [code]en_US[/code]). If translations have been loaded beforehand for the new locale, they will be applied.

method.name: standardize_locale
method.description: Returns a [param locale] string standardized to match known locales (e.g. [code]en-US[/code] would be matched to [code]en_US[/code]). If [param add_defaults] is [code]true[/code], the locale may have a default script or country added.

method.name: translate
method.description: Returns the current locale's translation for the given message and context. [b]Note:[/b] This method always uses the main translation domain.

method.name: translate_plural
method.description: Returns the current locale's translation for the given message, plural message and context. The number [param n] is the number or quantity of the plural object. It will be used to guide the translation system to fetch the correct plural form for the selected language. [b]Note:[/b] This method always uses the main translation domain.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], enables the use of pseudolocalization on the main translation domain. See [member ProjectSettings.internationalization/pseudolocalization/use_pseudolocalization] for details.
